ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ cups Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
¼ cup creamy or chunky peanut butter

cookingTips: Use very ripe bananas with lots of brown spots for maximum sweetness and binding
Mash banana until completely smooth before mixing
Roll into bite-sized balls and refrigerate until firm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These no-bake energy bites are quick and require no oven. Suggest making a batch on Sunday and storing in the fridge for week-long snacks.
